description.value:
You release a terrible wail that tears at the spirits of all nearby. All living creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take @Damage[((@actor.level - 2)d6)[void]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic] save. The damage is 4d6, plus 1d6 for every level you have beyond 6th.

Awakening Your scream echoes in the mind. You can choose to emit a silent psychic wail instead, which changes the damage type to @Damage[(@actor.level - 2)d6[mental]], changes the save to a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic|traits:mental,deviant,magical,necromancy|overrideTraits:true] save, removes the auditory trait, and adds the mental trait.

Awakening Your wail saps your foes' strength. In addition to the normal effects, living creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round on a success (but not a critical success), enfeebled 1 for 1 minute on a failure, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute on a critical failure.
